definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut off (NH id., separate, Ph. [[קחה]] cut off, exterminate; Aram. [[קְחָא]], qs.o0 break off (e.g. bread); Ar. qas.a0 be remote, qus.ya0 remote extremity);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. [[קְחוֹת עַמִּים]] Hb Hab 2:10 cutting off many peoples; Vrss [[קַצּוֹת]] (√ [[קחץ]]); Gr Now conj. [[הֲחִיקוֹתָ]].

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לִקַצּוֹת בְּ]] 2Ki 10:32 to cut off in Israel; read prob. [[לִקְחוֹף]] to be angry with, Targum Hi Che:Crit. n. Is 14:6 (in Comm.) Kmp:KauKit Benz, Vulgate; Gr [[לָקוּץ]]; Pt. [[מְקַצֶּח רַגְלַיִם]] Pr 26:6 (fig.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הִקְחוּ]] Le 14:41, acc. dust; Inf. cstr. [[הִקְחוֹת]] v:Le 14:43, acc. house, in both appar. = [[קָחַע]] scrape, scrape off (q.v., v:Le 14:41 a), and so prob. read, viz. [[הִקְחְעוּ]], [[הַקְחִיעַ]], RS:JPhil. xvi (1888), 72 Dr -Wh Di-Ry Baen.
